name: pterodactyl
description: Pterodactyl Panel is a self-hosted game server management platform. It supports multiple game servers with Docker isolation, user access controls, and admin dashboards.

features.title: Game Server Management
features.description: Host and manage multiple game servers including Minecraft, CS:GO, and Rust

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Run each game server in isolated Docker containers for security and resource control

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Create user accounts with granular permissions for server management and file access

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Edit server configuration files directly through the web interface with syntax highlighting

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Schedule automatic backups of game servers with retention policies and restoration

features.title: Startup Management
features.description: Configure server startup parameters, environment variables, and boot sequences
